name: Interrogation Room (DanielOschepkov)
description:
What is it?

A very short-story horror game about very strange police interrogation, where you play as a police officer (probably).

Gameplay

Conduct and complete the police interrogation process, playing as a police officer. You opponent has some strange things in his behavior (and probably he has some dark secrets).

Controls

W, A, S, D - movement

Mouse - look around

E - interaction

Developer

Game made by Daniel Oschepkov (Serious Duck Studios)

Made with Unity. Some assets are taken from Sketchfab and Quixel Megascans.

Used animations from Mixamo (Adobe)
